# ASM-302 Vanyk Missile System
A basic combat-rated [color=GreenYellow]missile[/color] pod turret.
## Pod Specifications
- Firerate: [color=crimson] 60 RPM [/color]/[color=deepskyblue] 1 RPS [/color] - Sell Value: [color=greenyellow][bold]2250 Spesos[/bold][/color] - Capacitor Storage: [color=orange]40000u[/color] - Capacitor Recharge: [color=turquoise]350u/s[/color] - Capacitor Fire Cost: [color=turquoise]300u[/color]
## Missile Specifications
- Acceleration: [color=mediumspringgreen][bold]60 m/sÂ²[/bold][/color] - Tracking Range: [color=orangered][bold]800m[/bold][/color] - Scanning Arc: [color=teal]15 degrees[/color] - Launch Speed: [color=darkorange]60 m/s[/color] - Max Speed: [color=darkorange]140 m/s[/color] - Range: [color=orange]2046m[/color]
